title: History tab only shows "Today" and that's all...
content:
So, on Windows 10 I noticed that when I click the History tab I see Show All History and when I click that the only option I get is Today..very odd.

On my Windows 7 Home Premium when I do the same steps I have access to "Today", "Yesterday", "Last 7 days" and various recent months.

This is what I'm accustomed to and was hoping to get input on why I only get Today option on my Windows 10 computer.

Looking forward to your reply...

JF
creator: jono5900

title: after updating my bookmarks and favorites have disappeared!!
content: my VA.gov website stated I needed to update firefox....I did (I think or did I 'reinstall' it?). Now MANY years worth ob bookmarks and favorites have disappeared. WHERE did they go? This has never happened before.
creator: leland_enterprises

title: Secure Connection
content:
I just updated Firefox beta version to 94.0b9 and now I can’t seem to go to some websites. Like “support.mozilla.com” - “accounts.firefox.com” - “addons.mozilla.com” I get an error message “An error occurred during a connection to “support.mozilla.com” PR_END_OF_FILE_ERROR The same thing happens with many other websites that I need to go to. I had taken a screenshot of the message but I can’t upload it! because I can’t go to this website from my Desktop PC, so I am doing this report from my iPhones browser.

Thanks for your help.
creator: FranksFirefox

title: FF 93 NOT Saving Passwords
content: Have just updated to a newer iMac which will run FF V93 (64 Bit) and having to manually insert each and every password and FF IS NOT Saving them even though it prompts me to save them. All boxes are ticked in the Security section to Save them... WHAT am I missing here???? This is driving me nuts as I have spent hours and hours retracing my steps over and over again.
creator: elmorr76

title: How to make exception for the Firefox sync?
content: I set my Firefox clear the cookies when it shut down. Every day I turn on my laptop, the Firefox sync is diconnected. So, I'd like to add the Firefox account as the exceptions, but I have no idea what the address is.
creator: nothingness6

title: browser blocking pages
content: Hi, I really wanted to like Firefox, but it is just too aggravating when it refuses to open a page regardless of what I try to do. I tried the suggested solutions to no avail. These are regular sites, AAA site to change my address... nope no go. I opened the page on Chrome without a glitch. A government site for the Global Entry application... nope that neither. And many other sites that are NORMAL without any weird anything, just blocked and nothing works at all. I am afraid I will just go back to Chrome, as it is very inconvenient to keep switching for this or that. I am glad I didn't just delete Chrome at all, and left it on my phone as well. I have no clue of what is going on, but whatever you are doing is going overboard indeed. Your solutions DO NOT WORK PERIOD. and who needs the aggravation of trying this or that (to no avail by the way) when there is already so much aggravation to go around in the world as it is. Well this is what I had to say. and I will look into transferring all I have saved in Firefox back into Chrome. So google spies on people.... I got nothing relevant to hide and who knows maybe you do too. Well then, good bye, so long. Don't fault me for giving up, you did not listen to people one bit. Dalila Hardwick
creator: dalidali

title: Clear History doesn't work anymore
content: I was trying to clear the history from my browser, and instead of clicking Shift > Command > Delete, I clicked Shift > Command > '+', which changed the zoom for the home page, but after putting it back, now I cannot clear history anymore because the keyboard command no longer pulls up the option, and the Clear History option in the menu is greyed out?? (attached) I think I am going to have to uninstall then reinstall the browser to fix it, but not happy about this, and do not understand why this would happen. Can someone explain this stupidity to me please?? Thanks in advance!!
creator: zlloyd2
